name: .HSTX
summary: Learn about .HSTX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open an HSTX file with 3hs theme creator (Web). To do so, click the Choose File button that appears in the Load existing HSTX: section. Then, navigate to and open your HSTX file.
To use an HSTX file with 3hs, place it in the following directory on your Nintendo 3DS's SD card (with 3hs installed):
Then, select the theme from 3hs's theme selection menu.
